thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Aulivia Opera - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cool stay
thread.title_full: Cool stay - Review of BEST WESTERN Aulivia Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: groovetown
title: Cool stay
text: Best Western did a great job transforming this typically boring small Parisian hotel to a fresh and funky hotel with a boutique feeling. Nicely styled, clean and with friendly service and a good breakfast. Rooms are Parisian small but clean, and either face the street or a light yard. Walls are thin, so earplugs are your friend. Good shower in bathroom.
